name: Text.Case
desc: A scheme for transforming the capitalization of characters within text.

items.name: case lowercase
items.desc: Displays text in all lowercase characters.

items.name: case uppercase
items.desc: Displays text in all uppercase characters.

items.name: static func == (Text.Case, Text.Case) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two cases are equal.

items.name: static func != (Self, Self) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two cases are unequal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the case by passing them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the case.
